definition: washbowl/basin for washing hands and face

sentences.english: Be gentle when washing your face and hair or using cosmetics.
sentences.chinese: 洗脸，梳头和用化妆品时，行动要柔柔等。

sentences.english: It's a good habit to wash up before a meal.
sentences.chinese: 饭前洗手洗脸是好习惯。

sentences.english: What exactly am I to do with an empty washbowl?
sentences.chinese: 我拿这个洗脸盆作什么？

sentences.english: Eat what thing to belong to individual psychokinesis problem, wash a face?
sentences.chinese: 吃什么东西属个人意志力问题，洗脸呢？

sentences.english: As a kind of oil, it is surprisingly water-soluble and can be thoroughly wash off with water.
sentences.chinese: 没有紧绷感，并能留住滋润，让洗脸也变成一种享受。

sentences.english: Who had makeup on in the face to be sure to thoroughly clean cream remover.
sentences.chinese: 上过妆的人，在洗脸前一定要先用清洁霜来彻底卸妆。

sentences.english: There were still vendors on the dork to sell face-washing water and white gourd soup.
sentences.chinese: 码头上依然有人在卖洗脸水和冬瓜汤。

sentences.english: I can see you had eggs for breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 老师斥责来前洗脸，“我能看你早饭吃的鸡蛋”。

sentences.english: The skin when washing a face is prickled , what reason be?
sentences.chinese: 洗脸时皮肤刺痛，是什么原因？

sentences.english: He laid that case aside then he went to the lavatory to wash his face.
sentences.chinese: 他把案件搁置一边然后去盥洗室洗脸。

sentences.english: Also, I would like her monsters to insist that Gaga wash her face more often.
sentences.chinese: 并且，我希望她的保护神能坚持要求她经常洗脸。

sentences.english: In the morning, we first wash faces and brush our teeth.
sentences.chinese: 每天晨起，一定要洗脸，并且刷牙漱口。

sentences.english: I asked Kordax if I could use his washbowl .
sentences.chinese: 我问克达斯能否用他的洗脸盆。

sentences.english: You have to wash your face to clean the eye discharge.
sentences.chinese: 你必须去洗脸把眼屎给洗失。

sentences.english: B: Well, I only need to wash my face and brush my teeth, so usually 8:15.
sentences.chinese: 我走之前只需要洗脸和刷牙，所以经常是八点一刻走。

sentences.english: Jimo in the Dragon Boat Festival the morning wash your face with dew.
sentences.chinese: 即墨在端午节早晨用露水洗脸。

definition: to wash one's hair/to have a shampoo
to remove makeup/(old) to take off formal dress and ornaments
to wash one's hands/to go to the toilet
to spread/to lay out/to apply (powder, ointment etc)/sufficient (to cover)/enough
